job.title: Data Scientist - Strategy & Analytics
job.description: pTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy ppbrppOur US Safety team provides key support for TikToks innovative initiatives stateoftheart products and integrated platforms servicing our US market As a Data Scientist on TikToks US Safety team you will be instrumental in ensuring that TikTok remains a safe trustworthy and riskfree environment to create and enjoy content across all of our apps while protecting our brand The ideal candidate will have a background in a technical field will have experience working with large production data sets and will have some experience delivering data products on a fastpaced team ppbrppThis position will be fulltime and will be based in our Los Angeles CA locationppbrppResponsibilitiesppbrpp Partner with product operations policy and engineering teams to scope design execute measure and improve the impact of US Safety efforts on the US TikTok businesspp Lead complex data analysis to develop track and maintain key metrics to ensure alignment across stakeholderspp Collaborate with data teams across the globe to form best practices regarding data modeling and visualizationpp Leverage data mining model development statistical and regression techniques Have an understanding of when to use these various methodologies based on the scope size and nuances of the problempp Acquire new data from various production systems and databases Have an understanding of ETL frameworkppQualificationsppbrppBasic Qualificationsppbrpp 2 years of experience in data science data analytics or quantitative analysispp Expert background in utilizing SQLPython to extract manipulate and analyze datasetspp Experience building data infrastructure designing data architecture building data pipelines implementing scalable monitoring and implementing reporting solutionspp Experience with at least one data visualization tool eg TableauMode AnalyticsLookeretcpp Experience with data modeling and statistical analysis techniques including hypothesis testing model evaluation and common regression and classification algorithmsppbrppPreferred qualifications ppbrpp Experience working with international partners in different time zonespp Curiosity and strong motivation to dissect a highly complex challenge capability to thrive in a dynamic environmentppbrppEEODampI StatementppTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills experiences and unique perspectives Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace At TikTok our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy To achieve that goal we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach We believe individuals shouldnt be disadvantaged because of their background or identity but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience We are passionate about this and hope you are tooppbrppTikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process If you need assistance or an accommodation please reach out to us at RecruitingCorptiktokcomp
